name: Lawn Bot
description:
Somewhere in the Pacific Northwest a reclusive inventor has let his yard slip into disarray. Rather than solve this problem himself has chosen to put his little robotic assistant to work.

This robot automatically moves forward mowing anything in it's path (hopefully primarily grass) with no remorse or effort on the operator's part. The robot may have a couple kinks like not being able to stop and occasionally getting a massive super charge from the biomass generator, but other than that it's easy peasy!
